description: Three-step sparring sequences for 6th keup students (sequences 8-10)

sequences.name: 3-Step Sparring #8
sequences.description: Knife hand blocks with side kick counter
sequences.key_learning_points: High defense with powerful kick techniques

attack.description: Step forward and execute front punch to middle section

defense.description: Step back with right foot, execute middle block with left arm

attack.description: Continue forward with front punch to middle section

defense.description: Step back with left foot, execute middle block with right arm

steps.timing: Return to countering after the block, executing each counter move separately and cleanly
steps.key_points: Place foot following kick and step forward
steps.common_mistakes: Falling from kick into next stance

attack.description: Final forward punch with right hand

defense.description: Slide back at 45deg into a guarding block beyond reach of opponent's punch

counter.description: Execute a middle section side kick from the rear (right) leg, landing into L stance, executing a knife hand strike to opponent's neck

sequences.name: 3-Step Sparring #9
sequences.description: Palm pushing blocks with multiple counters
sequences.key_learning_points: Coordination and timing to accurately block fist with palm

attack.description: Step forward and execute front punch to middle section

defense.description: Step back with right foot, execute middle block with left arm

attack.description: Continue forward with front punch to middle section

defense.description: Step back with left foot, execute middle block with right arm

steps.timing: Return to countering after the block, executing each counter move separately and cleanly
steps.key_points: Place foot following kick and step forward
steps.common_mistakes: Falling from kick into next stance

attack.description: Final forward punch with right hand

counter.description: Execute a middle section turning kick to the solar plexus with the right foot. Place the right foot next to opponent's front (right) foot and draw left foot to vertical stance, executing high section knife hand strike

sequences.name: 3-Step Sparring #10
sequences.description: Knifehand blocks with reverse turning kick and strike counter
sequences.key_learning_points: Advanced defense patterns and spinning counters

attack.description: Step forward and execute front punch to middle section

defense.description: Step back with right foot, execute middle block with left arm

attack.description: Continue forward with front punch to middle section

defense.description: Step back with left foot, execute middle block with right arm

steps.timing: Counter by pulling back to safe distance, enabling time to chamber effectively
steps.key_points: Focus cleanly with left hand fully extended to ensure correct distance

attack.description: Final forward punch with right hand

defense.description: Slide back at 45deg beyond reach of opponent's punch into guarding block

counter.description: Reverse side kick (360deg clockwise), landing in walking stance with reverse knifehand srike to opponent's neck
counter.english: Reverse Side Kick, Reverse Knife Hand Inward Strike
counter.romanised: Bandae Yop Chagi, Bandae Sonkal Anaero Taerigi
